column3: Agree on removing the VerifySignature function that is only used by the tests.\n\nNACK on partially removing CScriptCheck::nHashType. Either it should be removed completely and this removal propagated through VerifyScript, or it would be better to keep it like this. Mind that `CScriptCheck` is meant to be a closure around `VerifyScript` (so should expose the same arguments). Now you just push the
Oh, that's what you do in #4555, well then it's fine with me.\n
